mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS VALUES (USERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{password}, 2, SYSDATE, null, 0, 0, 0, '일반회원가입', #{user_nickname}, '안녕하세요~:D', null, #{birth_year}, #{birth_month}, #{birth_day}, #{location1_no}, #{location2_no})
mapper.select: SELECT meeting.meeting_no, meeting.meeting_max, meeting.meeting_min, meeting.meeting_title, COUNT(meeting_participants.meeting_participants) as count, meeting_participants.meeting_status FROM MEETING join meeting_participants on meeting.user_no = meeting_participants.user_no WHERE meeting.user_no = #{user_no}
